HOME.title: GPUcloud.store – One stop shop for your HPC needs
HOME.description: GPUcloud.store – GPU cloud consulting, multi-cloud orchestration, and hybrid cloud implementation for high-performance computing workloads.

hero.headline: One stop shop for your
hero.subtitle: GPUcloud.store helps teams design and operate efficient GPU-first infrastructure – from multi-cloud orchestration to hybrid setups that include on-prem hardware. We cut through the noise, so your workloads scale instead of your burn.
hero.meta: Based in the EU. Connected to providers and partners across Europe and beyond.

card.title: HPC Control Panel
card.footnote: Multi-cloud & hybrid setups don't have to be a maze.
card.footnoteHighlight: We design the map, introduce the right providers, and help you ship.

about.title: Who's behind GPUcloud.store?
about.subtitle: GPUcloud.store is built around a simple idea: high-performance infrastructure should be understandable, negotiable, and aligned with your business goals – not just your benchmarks.

text.intro: We are cloud consultants with a global Independent Datacenter network powered by Si Exchange.
text.mission: We sit at the intersection of technical infrastructure, commercial reality, and cross-border networks. That means helping you choose not just the "fastest hardware", but the architecture and partnerships that actually move your roadmap forward.
text.approach: With access to a broad network of independent datacenters and GPU providers, we help you navigate capacity, pricing, and reliability while keeping your teams focused on building products — not chasing hardware.

orchestration.title: Multi-cloud orchestration:
orchestration.text: Evaluate and design setups across major providers and specialized GPU clouds.

hybrid.title: Hybrid implementations:
hybrid.text: Combine on-prem or colocation hardware with cloud capacity in a way that doesn't become operational hell.

sourcing.title: Vendor & hardware sourcing:
sourcing.text: Help you navigate GPU availability, pricing, and trusted partners in independent datacenters worldwide.

alignment.title: Cost & growth alignment:
alignment.text: Translate infra decisions into KPI impact: throughput, latency, margin, and runway.

contact.title: Tell us about your workloads
contact.subtitle: Whether you're fighting GPU scarcity, unpredictable invoices, or a messy multi-cloud setup, we can start with a short, focused conversation.

text.intro: Use the form to outline your current situation: what you're running, where it's running, and what's not working the way it should.

helpItems.ai: AI / ML teams scaling training or inference
helpItems.startups: Startups moving from single-cloud to multi-cloud
helpItems.companies: Companies considering hybrid or on-prem GPU fleets

text.response: You'll get a direct response — no automated sales sequence, no generic deck.
text.email: Prefer email? You can also reach out at

message.label: What are you running today?
message.placeholder: Briefly describe your workloads, current providers, and what you want to improve (cost, reliability, latency, capacity, etc.).

cards.title: Instant GPU Power
cards.description: Spin up high-performance GPUs in seconds for your most demanding workloads.

cards.title: Predictable Pricing
cards.description: Transparent hourly billing with no surprise fees or long-term lock-in.

cards.title: Global Availability
cards.description: Deploy close to your users with low-latency regions around the world.

contact.title: Request a Quote
contact.subtitle: Share your GPU configuration requirements and we'll get back to you with a custom quote.

gpuConfigs.title: A100 x8 — 640 GB HBM
gpuConfigs.details: Best for multi-node training runs with large models and long training windows. High VRAM and interconnect bandwidth.

gpuConfigs.title: H100 x4 — 320 GB HBM3
gpuConfigs.details: Great for mixed inference + fine-tuning workloads where you need strong BF16/FP8 performance but moderate scale.

gpuConfigs.title: L40S x8 — 192 GB GDDR6
gpuConfigs.details: Balanced choice for latency-sensitive inference and smaller trainings. Good value for general-purpose GPU workloads.

gpuConfigs.title: RTX 4090 x4 — 96 GB GDDR6X
gpuConfigs.details: Ideal for explorers and smaller teams running experiments, prototyping models, and doing heavy local development.

gpuConfigs.title: A100 x16 — 1.3 TB HBM
gpuConfigs.details: For the largest training jobs where you need as much VRAM and bandwidth as possible on a single high-density node.

gpuConfigs.title: MI300X x8 — 1.5 TB HBM3
gpuConfigs.details: AMD-based alternative for massive inference fleets and training jobs that are tuned for ROCm-compatible stacks.

selected.title: Selected Configurations ({count})

selected.empty: No configurations selected yet. Search and add configurations above to include them in your quote request.

help.title: What we can help with:
help.description: Stuck on something? Our team can help you choose the right mix of hardware, cloud providers, or hybrid architecture. Feel free to share roadblocks or wishlist items—we'll factor it into your quote.
help.emailIntro: You can also email us directly at

form.subtitle: Provide your contact details and any additional requirements. We'll reach out with next steps shortly.
